R is a programming language and environment designed for statistical computing and data analysis. It provides a wide range of tools for data manipulation, visualization, and modelling, and is widely used in research and applied statistics. Its extensive package ecosystem and reproducible workflow support make R a central tool for implementing and communicating statistical methods.
